description:
First produced for [Greenpeace's London HQ](https://www.opendesk.cc/workspaces/greenpeace), the Fin Bookshelf is part of the growing Fin range. The Bookshelf and its sibling, the Lockers, imagineer storage solutions for the design conscious. The Bookshelf features multiple depths, casting new contrasts and facilitates smarter organisation. With the traditional no-metal-parts Opendesk approach the Bookshelf is assembled seamlessly with every part carefully considered and highly material efficient. Designed to be standalone or joined, the Fin range slots in numerous workspace configurations with minimum fuss. ## How to buy
#### [Managing it Yourself? Get quotes from a local maker »](https://www.opendesk.cc/open/fin/fin-bookshelf/get-it-made) **£460 - 560** from a [maker near you](https://www.opendesk.cc/open/fin/fin-bookshelf/get-it-made) _Of which a proportion supports the designer, and keeps the platform ticking! [(find out more about how it works »)](https://www.opendesk.cc/designs/how-it-works)._ _PLEASE NOTE: Pricing varies based on your location and local maker capacity._
---
#### [Need additional help planning? Opendesk can help! »](https://www.opendesk.cc/workspaces/lets-fit-you-out) [Opendesk can help you](mailto:sales@opendesk.cc) specify designs, visualise your new space, obtain quotes and manage your project from start to finish. All products bought through Opendesk include a 12-month guarantee. Current UK pricing for this product & service (again including support for the designer and platform): **£510** **[REQUEST CALL BACK](https://www.opendesk.cc/workspaces/lets-fit-you-out)** _This service is only available in the UK at the moment, if you are outside the UK you can connect to a local maker near you. The price is based on recent UK maker quotes. Excludes VAT, delivery and assembly._
name: Fin Bookshelf
